name: Dawn City
description: Dawn City is a first-person VR shooting game in which the player must resist zombie monster attacks from all sides. As time goes on, the diffiuclty of the game rises. How many zombie attacks can you handle?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later Processor: Intel i5 4440 Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 4440 equivalent or better Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
